name: Eye 4 Eye (itch)
description:
Eye 4 Eye is a First-person Real-time 3D Adventure game which takes place in a futuristic dystopia where everyone has a brain chip installed for the betterment of society. 

You play as Hazel, a  low-rank detective, who will go on an adventure to solve a mysterious case and uncover truths about herself.

Features (as of now in the First Playable):

  • Explore - Navigate a greyboxed house in a First-person view.
  • Interact and Examine - Interact and closely examine certain objects in the world for clues. While examining, the player can also see the item history of that object.
  • Search Engine - Type inputs and search for clues on the search engine terminal for more information.
  • Puzzle - Gather clues and search for information to find the correct passcode to unlock the door.
